message.body: Happy Thanksgiving, my loves. Thank you for being my collaborators, my friends and my home. I am infinitely grateful for you. And we miss you around here
! Will try to have left overs! Love you ladies. Xo m
Oh how I ADORE you, Martha. I'm so sorry you're sick! Cold?! I seem to be ok..will take vitamins or something. Get rest, come home so I can take care of
Yea sore throat started yesterday, now aches and chills, fever. I'm the worst guest right now. I so wish I was home.
Oh babe! Oh ko!! How awful! I'm so sorry you're so sick. That is the worst. Let me know if there is anything you want me to get for you to have at home (
juice etc). You still coming back sat? Are you taking stuff to feel better?
